revised_title: Newton's Scientific Discoveries and Contributions in 1665-1666
tldr: This article by D.T. Whiteside explores Newton's significant scientific discoveries and contributions during the years 1665 and 1666. It highlights his work on the Doctrine of the Phenomena of Colors, the methods of fluxional calculus, and the theory of gravity. The article also discusses the challenges in confirming the accuracy of Newton's account of his discoveries and the influence of other mathematicians on his work.
